uk.ac.uea.framework

Interface Graphics

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidGraphics

    public interface Graphics
    Interface that provides a set of common methods needed for displaying graphics

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Graphics.ImageFormat
      enum value that specifies the format the images are to be displayed in RGB/ARGB8888/ARGB4444

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearScreen(int color)
      Method to clear the screen and reset it to a specified colour
      void drawARGB(int i, int j, int k, int l)
      Converts given colour information into an ARGB format that includes an alpha-channel
      void drawImage(Image Image, int x, int y)
      Overloaded method that draws an image given an Image object and co-ordinates of the top-left of the frame
      void drawImage(Image image, int x, int y, int srcX, int srcY, int srcWidth, int srcHeight)
      Draws an image given an Image object and a frame in which to draw it
      void drawLine(int x, int y, int x2, int y2, int color)
      Method to draw a line, from (x, y) to (x2, y2)
      void drawRect(int x, int y, int width, int height, int color)
      Method to draw a rectangular shape
      void drawString(java.lang.String text, int x, int y, Paint paint)
      Method that draws an image of inputted text parsed as a String object
      int getHeight()
      Method that gets the height of the implementation-specific object
      int getWidth()
      Method that gets the width of the implementation-specific object
      Image newImage(java.lang.String fileName, Graphics.ImageFormat format)
      Method that creates a new Image object given the file path and format of the image

    • Method Detail

      • newImage

        Image newImage(java.lang.String fileName,
             Graphics.ImageFormat format)
        Method that creates a new Image object given the file path and format of the image
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file path of the image
        format - the format the image is to be displayed in
        Returns:
        the Image object

      • clearScreen

        void clearScreen(int color)
        Method to clear the screen and reset it to a specified colour
        Parameters:
        color - the colour value (RGB) that the screen is to be reset to

      • drawLine

        void drawLine(int x,
            int y,
            int x2,
            int y2,
            int color)
        Method to draw a line, from (x, y) to (x2, y2)
        Parameters:
        x - horizontal co-ordinate of the first point
        y - vertical co-ordinate of the first point
        x2 - horizontal co-ordinate of the second point
        y2 - vertical co-ordinate of the second point
        color - colour of the line

      • drawRect

        void drawRect(int x,
            int y,
            int width,
            int height,
            int color)
        Method to draw a rectangular shape
        Parameters:
        x - horizontal co-ordinate of the point in the top-left of the rectangle
        y - vertical co-ordinate of the point in the top-left of the rectangle
        width - horizontal co-ordinate of the point in the bottom-right of the rectangle
        height - vertical co-ordinate of the point in the bottom-right of the rectangle
        color - colour of the object

      • drawImage

        void drawImage(Image image,
             int x,
             int y,
             int srcX,
             int srcY,
             int srcWidth,
             int srcHeight)
        Draws an image given an Image object and a frame in which to draw it
        Parameters:
        image - Image to be drawn
        x - horizontal co-ordinate of the point in the top-left of the frame
        y - vertical co-ordinate of the point in the top-left of the frame
        srcX - horizontal starting point of the top-left of the source image
        srcY - vertical starting point of the top-left of the source image
        srcWidth - width of the source image
        srcHeight - height of the source image

      • drawImage

        void drawImage(Image Image,
             int x,
             int y)
        Overloaded method that draws an image given an Image object and co-ordinates of the top-left of the frame
        Parameters:
        Image - Image to be drawn
        x - horizontal co-ordinate of the point in the top-left of the frame
        y - vertical co-ordinate of the point in the top-left of the frame

      • drawString

        void drawString(java.lang.String text,
              int x,
              int y,
              Paint paint)
        Method that draws an image of inputted text parsed as a String object
        Parameters:
        text - the text to be drawn
        x - the horizontal top-left point of the text image
        y - the vertical top-left point of the text image
        paint - the colouring style and colour

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Method that gets the width of the implementation-specific object
        Returns:
        width

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Method that gets the height of the implementation-specific object
        Returns:
        height

      • drawARGB

        void drawARGB(int i,
            int j,
            int k,
            int l)
        Converts given colour information into an ARGB format that includes an alpha-channel
        Parameters:
        i - alpha channel value
        j - red value
        k - green value
        l - blue value
